title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, August 3, 2020
description: It’s the birthday of British crime novelist P.D. James (1920-2014), who had a seat in the House of Lords and also worked as a local magistrate.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of British crime novelist P.D. James (1920-2014), who had a seat in the House of Lords and also worked as a local magistrate.
